Mark Van Peteghem wrote:
> love wrote:
> 
>> Can I do Web Based testing on say,
> "http://lava:8081/mypage" by using
>> JUNIT  to click my JSP
> buttons, fill in texts,  ... and not using
>> httpunit?
>> 
>> If there are ways out please reply to this Newbie soon.
> 
> In principle you could do it without httpunit, if you implement a lot
> of stuff that's already in httpunit yourself. But installing httpunit
> and learning to use it is a lot more efficient. Why don't you use
> httpunit? JUnit by itself doesn't have functionality to do
> want you want to do.

You might also want to take a look at jWebUnit.

Cheers, Ilja
